title: One hundred and ninety sermons on the hundred and nineteenth Psalm preached by the late reverend and learned Thomas Manton, D.D.  ; with a perfect alphabetical table directing to the principal matters contained therein.
author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
publisher: Printed for T.P. &c. and are to be sold by Michael Hide, bookseller in Exon,
notes: Contains frontispiece portrait of Thomas Manton, signed: R. White, sculpsit.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
